description: A vulnerability in the `isolated-vm` library or its implementation could allow a malicious user-defined formula to escape the AWS Lambda sandbox, leading to remote code execution.
mitigation_strategy: Enforce a minimal, least-privilege IAM role for the Lambda. Mandate a formal security review by an external specialist before go-live.
contingency_plan: Immediately disable the custom formula execution feature via a feature flag and rotate all credentials.
monitoring_trigger: CloudWatch alarms for unusual Lambda behavior (e.g., execution duration > 1000ms).

description: The complex logic for offline data synchronization contains edge-case bugs that could lead to silent user data loss or corruption when syncing after intermittent connectivity.
mitigation_strategy: Develop a comprehensive E2E test suite using Cypress that specifically targets offline scenarios, including manipulating client-side clocks to test conflict resolution.
contingency_plan: Establish a support workflow for users reporting data loss and develop a runbook for engineers to manually inspect database backups.
monitoring_trigger: An increase in API error rates on sync-related endpoints or client-side error monitoring alerts.

description: The complex CI/CD pipeline has multiple potential failure points (flaky E2E tests, security scanner false positives) that could block all deployments, halting the release of features and critical bug fixes.
mitigation_strategy: Implement a 'flaky test quarantine' policy. Document and practice a 'break-glass' emergency manual deployment procedure for critical hotfixes.
contingency_plan: Execute the emergency manual deployment procedure for any critical changes if the pipeline is blocked for more than 2 hours.
monitoring_trigger: GitHub Actions workflow failure notifications sent to a dedicated engineering channel.
